description: Common TypeScript/React client application code for Sourcegraph extension configuration and management, used in Sourcegraph and "Sourcegraph for X" products

scripts.tslint: yarn -s run tslint:build-rules && tslint -c tslint.json -p tsconfig.json
scripts.cover: TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module":"commonjs"}' nyc --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register  --require esm --all mocha --opts mocha.opts --timeout 10000
